question:
Fill in the missing words said by the Phantom in the movie The Phantom of the Opera:
Look at your _______ in the ___________! I am there inside!
Measured from base to peak, what is the worlds highest mountain?
On TV, what was the name of Sergeant Prestons horse?
What was the name of the computer software company for which Peter, Michael and Samir worked in the movie Office Space?
Progesterone, the hormone of pregnancy, is synthesized in this part of the body.
Borneo is the 3rd largest island in the world.
What did Charlies grandpa do when the little boy showed him the golden ticked he found in the candy bar in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?
This English mathematician, logician and cryptographer is widely regarded as the father of modern computer science.
Who was the first woman to have a gold record?
The hairs of a natural blonde can be described as this.
correct_answer: More than those of a brunette
incorrect_answers: Thinner than those of a brunette
The same number as those of a brunette
Fewer than those of a brunette

question: The word hurricane” comes from the name of a Caribbean god - Huracan. Huracan was god of what?
Ancient Japanese thought this animal caused earthquakes.
